```{r}
library(ConfidenceEllipse)

data("glass", package = "ConfidenceEllipse")
# Confidence ellipse
ellipse <- confidence_ellipse(.data = glass, x = SiO2, y = Na2O)
ellipse_grp <- confidence_ellipse(

  x = SiO2,
  y = Na2O,
  .group_by = glassType
)
```
